metadata.title: CVE-2022-45869 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition in the x86 KVM subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.1-rc6 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS crashor host OS memory corruption) when nested virtualisation and the TDP MMUare enabled.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
